summary: A cliffside home in Solitude, perfect for an Imperial Soldier.
descriptionHtml:
Ever tire of the high-flying, fast-living life of a Dovahkiin? Ever wonder what it would be like to settle into the repetetive, mildly exciting life of an Imperial soldier? Then this is the home for you! Comes complete with a blacksmithing forge, alchemy lab and enchanting table. The home is located in Solitude, behind the Bard's College. This mod is a follow-up to my other player home, The Humble Abode:http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34954/?

This mod is also on the Steam Workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=243834450

Check out my channel on youtube!
https://www.youtube.com/user/TheMBMConsortium
author: SkildNinja
